programme.desc: Lies and deceit can often throw investigators off the trail of justice. But when hard evidence contradicts a killer's story, police must use the clues to piece together the truth.

programme.title: The New Detectives: Fateful Twist
programme.desc: A southeastern Virginia community is stunned by a crime no one can believe. A pregnant woman murdered, her baby lost. Across the state, another town feels a similar shock, a brutal, random slaying in a most unexpected setting.

programme.title: The New Detectives: Witness To Terror
programme.desc: Black Boxes: Little evidence is left after an airplane takes a deadly plunge from the sky. Investigators' best hope for an answer comes from the flight data recorder known as a black box.

programme.title: The New Detectives: In The Line of Fire
programme.desc: Bombers, snipers, spree killers: some people don't care who they kill, they just want to hurt innocent people.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: Today, the chefs are faced with a selection of exotic protein foods and have to try to grab what they want to use for their dish, including alligator, wild boar and ostrich.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: Today's challenge is to prepare a homecoming dinner for the Calabasas High School with the theme of Mardi Gras using seafood, chicken and beef.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: The team that identifies the most foods in a blind taste test wins a shopping spree. During dinner service, the chefs present a five-course meal for two charitable organisations.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: The contestants must find keys for lockers containing various cuts of steak, then prepare a delicious dish in under 35 minutes. Dinner service sees the return of steak night.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: Gordon Ramsay puts aspiring chefs through a series of gruelling challenges. Pairs of contestants battle it out in the `Taste It and Make It' challenge, with the winning duo visiting the Queen Mary ocean liner.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: The top five chefs prepare a unique and elegant small-plate dish in under 45 minutes for people attending a private symphony performance, for which the challenge winner earns a private helicopter tour of Los Angeles.

programme.title: Full Custom Garage
programme.desc: Car builder Ian Roussel takes on one of his biggest challenges yet as he tries to turn a Wild Cartoon drawing into a real life Hot Rod. Part 1 of 2.

programme.title: Full Custom Garage
programme.desc: Car builder Ian Roussel continues the challenge as he tries to turn a Wild Cartoon drawing into a real life Hot Rod. Part 2 of 2.

programme.title: Full Custom Garage
programme.desc: Car builder Ian Roussel takes on two Ford Falcon projects. Part 1 of 2.

programme.title: Full Custom Garage
programme.desc: Car builder Ian Roussel continues the transformation of the two Ford Falcons. Part 2 of 2.

programme.title: Full Custom Garage
programme.desc: Car builder Ian Roussel takes on a classic 1958 Harley Davidson and a 1984 Kawasaki police cruiser.

programme.title: Full Custom Garage
programme.desc: Car builder Ian Roussel transforms a 1944 vintage firetruck.

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: Harper discovers a program that can destroy eight of the Seefra planets, killing millions.

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: While Harper works on a way to save the Seefra system, a spy sneaks aboard Andromeda and attacks Beka.

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: An attempt is made to fix the blinking sun of Seefra, but Trance is replaced by a doppelganger.

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: When Dylan is badly injured in a lab explosion, he travels through a series of alternate realities.

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: Rommie is rebuilt to help evacuate the Seefra system.

programme.title: Andromeda: One More Day's Light
programme.desc: A warlord convinces his followers that the approaching destruction of the outer planets is a plot to make it easier to loot their planet.

programme.title: Sensing Murder: Taken for a Ride
programme.desc: 54 year old Simon Buis was savagely beaten and kicked to death in an Auckland park in 1980 by persons unknown. To this day, his killers have evaded capture.

programme.title: Sensing Murder: Where's Grandad?
programme.desc: 65-year-old Alan Gordon Woodford of Bedford St. Mossburn left his home on foot Saturday morning April 20, 1985 and was never seen or heard of again.

programme.title: Sensing Murder
programme.desc: 19-year-old Joan Wech left New Zealand for the bright lights of Sydney. But the first step on her overseas adventure would be her last. Was this a robbery gone wrong, a savage random attack or a revenge killing by a jealous ex-lover?

programme.title: Sensing Murder: Seeking Siegfried
programme.desc: Katikati man Siegfried Newman disappeared on February 25, 2008, after he had dropped his sons Thomas, 9, and Oliver, 7, at Pahoia School. Police carried out a three-day search but found no sign of him.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: The Night Caller: Eric Edgar Cooke
programme.desc: In 1959, the carefree culture of Perth changed forever when a plague of crime hit the city. By early 1963, the crime wave had escalated to serial murder.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: Headless Body: The Kim Barry Murder
programme.desc: In 1981, the headless and fingerless body of 19-year-old Kim Narelle Barry was found dumped in the bush at a mountain lookout near Wollongong, south of Sydney.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: The Disappearance of Donald Mackay
programme.desc: A small group of local criminals with mafia connections were making vast fortunes in the famous NSW Riverina irrigation district from marijuana plantations.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: Ivan Milat: The Backpacker Murders
programme.desc: The backpacker murder case in the Belanglo State Forest, south west of Sydney, has entered Australian criminal folklore.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters: Future Perfect
programme.desc: Peter offers to stop Australian Bloodline's from repossessing Drovers if Claire will agree to marry him. After ultimately rejecting Peter's offer, Claire takes him on in the Stockman's Challenge but is seriously injured in a fall.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters: Fairy Tale Ending
programme.desc: Meg agonises over whether to send more money to Jodi who is still on her overseas travels, and using up her mum's funds like there's no tomorrow.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters: Better the Devil You Know
programme.desc: Alex and Claire's secret brings one family together and brings another to the brink.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters: The Road Home
programme.desc: After months of searching, Becky finally finds out what happened to Brick. She and Jodi discover the horrible truth after Becky is led to Brick by a dream.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters: An Affair to Forget
programme.desc: It seems Sally is taking advantage of Nick's absence in town by inviting a stranger over to Wilgul. Claire warns Tess against putting her nose in, but she just can't resist.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters: Put to the Test
programme.desc: A careless prank on the groom threatens to put a stop to the impending nuptials of Jodi and Alberto. Meanwhile, Claire's expanding waistline is causing her all kinds of problems!

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: For nearly 20 years, T&T Supermarket dominated sales, but now competition is “cut throat”. That's good enough reason for Tina Lee, the boss of T&T Supermarket, to swap her upscale lifestyle for a week working undercover in her own stores.

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: This episode nets an exclusive “behind the scenes” look at what it really takes to get fish on our dinner plates.

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: Toronto Transit Commission (TTC) City Councillor and TTC Chair Karen Stintz goes undercover inside the country's largest mass transit system to get her hands dirty with some of the toughest and grittiest jobs.

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Dan Dizio is the CEO of the fastest growing pretzel bakery on the East Coast, Philly Pretzel Factory. Dan goes undercover as Michael Downs, a data entry processor who will be switching jobs with Philly Pretzel employees.

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: CEO Ellis Jacob goes undercover doling out snacks and tickets while assessing how to enhance the moviegoer experience within Canada’s largest motion picture exhibitor across the board.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters
programme.desc: On this episode of Ghost Hunters, TAPS is asked to investigate the abandoned Milton School in Alton, Ill. where some studentsare said to still be walking through the halls.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters
programme.desc: Despite mysterious and unnerving warnings from locals, the Ghost Hunters face their fears and stay on mission: to help people confront terrifying paranormal encounters that have shaken them to their core.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Episode 1
programme.desc: Despite mysterious and unnerving warnings from locals, the Ghost Hunters face their fears and stay on mission: to help people confront terrifying paranormal encounters that have shaken them to their core.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Residual Haunts
programme.desc: On this episode of Ghost Hunters, TAPS travels to Prospect, Maine to investigate Fort Knox, built before the Civil War to protect the Penobscot narrows.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Murdered Matron
programme.desc: Special guest investigator Meredith Vieira joins the TAPS team, as they investigate Sailors' Snug Harbor in Staten Island, New York. Once a retirement home to weathered seaman, it's now home to the spirit of a murdered matron.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Stormy Weather
programme.desc: Going after two fugitives in one day is tough enough without the facing Colorado's notoriously unpredictable weather. Today, it's the threat of severe thunderstorms, hail and area wide tornado warnings.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: One for the Money
programme.desc: It hurts Dog to see people who after years of walking the straight and narrow, suddenly lose their way. But today's case is a member of the law enforcement community who has recently gone astray, and that truly troubles the Dog.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Reality Check
programme.desc: Dog is back in Denver and in hot pursuit of a woman wanted for identity theft. The sad reality is that the identify which has been robbed is her own. She's traded in a bright future for a life on the wrong side of the law.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: No Piece of Cake
programme.desc: Being hunted by the Dog is a lousy way to celebrate your birthday but that's exactly the spot that Robert finds himself in today. He's missed his court date, quit his job, and vacated his last known address.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Prayers and Mace
programme.desc: Both brother Tim and fellow Honolulu bondsman James need Dog's help to track down their hard to find fugitives. The two cases on the docket today are challenging, especially the hunt for Gregory, a felon with a lengthy rap sheet.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: New Dog in Town
programme.desc: It's Beth's birthday and Dog knows just what she needs. He surprises Beth with Delilah, a puppy small enough to sit in the palm of her hand. Beth is so happy that she insists on taking the puppy with her on today's bounty.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Trick or Treat
programme.desc: It's Halloween, and before Dog and Beth can help the kids carve their pumpkins, they have some business to attend to. It involves knocking on doors and meeting the neighbors but instead of hunting for treats they're on the search for a fugitive.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Girl Trouble
programme.desc: Dog and the team have girl trouble in this case. Krystal jumped bail and seems to have vanished into the high plains of Colorado. To make matters worse, she's running with her lover (and bond co-signer) Carrie. But Thelma and Louise they ain't.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Seeing the Light
programme.desc: Today Leland and Dog make a quick visit to the police supply store to get some new gadgets for the team but they can't linger because they've also got a fugitive to catch. Their target is reputed to have an explosive temper.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Fishful Thinking
programme.desc: Jase's hopes to win the inaugural Duck Commander Fishing Tournament is buoyed when he is able to enlist the help of legendary angler Bill Dance. Meanwhile, Willie's vanity over his greying beard leads him to make a questionable decision.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: When Doves Fry
programme.desc: Jase and Jep make a deal with Mia and Merritt to get them to go dove hunting with them. Si tries to make some extra cash by starting a West Monroe tour.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Carpnado
programme.desc: Jumping Asian carp have invaded Monroe's waters so Jase and the guys set out to try to stop them from spreading further. Meanwhile, Willie and Si have to run Willie's Duck Diner for the day.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: The Campfire Diaries
programme.desc: The family spends a weekend at their childhood summer camp, reliving old memories and working to repair a tennis court Willie built twenty years ago. While at the camp, Jep tries to pass a lifeguard swimming test he failed as a teenager.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Rowdy's Big Day
programme.desc: Rowdy's adoption is finalized and he officially becomes a Robertson. Jase gets his first massage and enjoys it more than he expected.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Disappearing Acts
programme.desc: After Willie and Jase lose Si's tea cup, Si makes them go to great lengths to find it. When the entertainment for Gus's 1st birthday party falls through, Jep fills in as a magician.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Dance Dads
programme.desc: Willie, Korie, Jase and Missy take dance lessons from Sadie to prepare for Reed and Rebecca's upcoming weddings. Jase's plan to perform Reed's wedding ceremony may fall through when he waits until the last minute to renew his ordainment.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: End of an Era
programme.desc: When Si decides to retire to pursue a music career, the family organizes a party in his honor. Meanwhile, Willie, Phil, and Jase take a road trip to try to recreate an old duck call for Si's retirement gift.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Looking Back and Talking Quack
programme.desc: The Robertson family takes a look back at 130 episodes of Duck Dynasty.

programme.title: Timber Kings: Old Dog, New Tricks
programme.desc: Bryan Sr. resurrects an ancient crane dubbed Rust Bucket to complete a remote fishing cabin. Meanwhile, Beat struggles with two huge projects competing for time and square footage on the work yard.

programme.title: Timber Kings: Cold War
programme.desc: In Kansas, tensions run high when Andre muscles in on Sam’s big build. And back at the log yard, winter gales put a chill on Peter’s enormous project for a Russian client.

programme.title: Behind Bars: The World's Toughest Prisons: Tent City Jail, Phoenix, Arizona, USA
programme.desc: Old army tents left over from the Korean War house prisoners instead of cells. The Sheriff is a hard man who refuses to spend any more than he has to on his prisoners. Harassment and humiliation is a part of everyday life at Tent City.

programme.title: Behind Bars: The World's Toughest Prisons: Antanimora Prison, Madagascar
programme.desc: Desperate overcrowding, rats, and disease come standard in Antanimora Prison. Surrounded by the capital Antananarivo, it's bursting at the seams. It was originally built for 800 prisoners, but now it contains more than 3,000 prisoners.

programme.title: Behind Bars: The World's Toughest Prisons: San Pedro Prison, La Paz, Bolivia
programme.desc: Imagine a prison so fierce that guards stay outside for fear of their lives. Inside, the prisoners are in control: murderers, violent offenders, drug bosses. The inmates rule and anarchy prevails. Only the strongest survive this lawless place.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Game Boy
programme.desc: Christy is done with Demetrice's video game obsession! He said he's better off with his games than being accused of looking at every woman that passes by. Will Demetrice snap back into reality or is this game over?

programme.title: Divorce Court: Pour Up Drank
programme.desc: Floyd Steven’s jealousy is leading Alqueisha “Quey” Benjamin to consider breaking it off. Quey is becoming an alcoholic because of his controlling ways, but Floyd has caught her in a few lies and suspects her of cheating!

programme.title: Divorce Court: Alpha Girl
programme.desc: Krystal is an alpha woman with a big personality and Caleb is not having it. Krystal resents him for proposing only after her father died while Caleb hates Krystal controlling their finances. Can Judge Toler help them?

programme.title: Divorce Court: In My Feelings
programme.desc: Raymond, also known as @IamRollingRay, is an Instagram sensation who says his high school sweetheart is jealous of his social media fan base. Christian thinks Ray shows more attention to his fanbase, accusing him of cheating with his followers.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Lesbihonest
programme.desc: Porcha has had enough of Ivory's promiscuous behavior. He claims Porcha has more tricks and secrets than Houdini and her lying has taken its toll. Can Judge Lynn Toler help this couple or is it time for Cupid to take better aiming lessons?

programme.title: Divorce Court: Fantasy Fail
programme.desc: Victoria is sick of Casey neglecting his responsibilities. Casey feels like a slave for taking care of the kids while she flies around the world for modeling gigs. Can Casey break out of the Mr. Mom role and start helping with the bills?

programme.title: Divorce Court: Tardy for the Party
programme.desc: Dashia says William is a cheater and spends most of his money on alcohol instead of paying the bills. William says Dashia is sneaky, belittles him, has trust issues and allows her family to interfere in their relationship.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Stay with Me Part 1
programme.desc: Johnnie says she suspects Henri of cheating now because he acts indifferent and doesn’t come home most nights. Henri points the finger back claiming Johnnie's not only a cheater, but also enables her family members and has developed a gambling habit.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Stay with Me Part 2
programme.desc: Johnnie says she suspects Henri of cheating now because he acts indifferent and doesn’t come home most nights. Henri points the finger back claiming Johnnie's not only a cheater, but also enables her family members and has developed a gambling habit.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Forever My Lady
programme.desc: Despite their age gap, Tamara and Jasimine have been together for 10 years. Tamara claims Jasimine sends risque texts to other people. Jasimine claims Tamara explodes in fits of rage. Can this couple get over their age gap?

programme.title: Divorce Court: Stir Crazy
programme.desc: America says that Nathaniel’s controlling ways has taken the relationship to the point of no return. Nathaniel says she’s always flirting with other men and even coming home with a hickies.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Speak My Truth
programme.desc: Chante says her boyfriend, Steve of 8 years is trying to end her “hot girl summer.” Not only that, but he doesn’t trust her, is controlling and wants to marry her. Chante isn’t ready for marriage and just wants to have fun.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Mister Mom
programme.desc: It's been quite a while since Tim Chapman put down his mace can and bulletproof vest to care for his growing family. When his old friend Dog calls asking for help tracking an elusive felon, Tim jumps into action.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Your Lying Eyes
programme.desc: Kolani's on the run, left his wife to look after four kids and left Dog holding the bag for the $10k bond. So their pursuit on this case takes them into some parts of Ohau, and the human heart, that few of us will ever see.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Mama's Boys
programme.desc: Dog visits his mother's grave for inspiration before heading out to find Frankie, a violent fugitive hiding in the jungle. The spirit of Ma Chapman seems to help when Dog finds an unusual ally; Frankie's mother.

programme.title: Operation Repo: Lyndah's Revenge
programme.desc: Matt and Froy continue their risky run in Tijuana, confronting a strip club owner who keeps a tight grip on his vehicle and his employees. Then, Lou and Cousin Rob are in a case of he said- she said when a seductive young debtor calls in the police.

programme.title: Operation Repo: The New Boss
programme.desc: Lou has retired, making Sonia the new boss, but will she be able to keep the company going without her big brother? Matt and Ronnie try to take a car away from a yuppie with an unusual taste for red meat.

programme.title: Operation Repo: We Have to Dispose of It
programme.desc: First, Sonia and Matt hunt down a truck that's being used by a pool cleaner to engage in some illicit activities with a collection of wealthy wives. Then, Lou and Sonia find themselves in the middle of a business dispute when they try to sneak off.

programme.title: Operation Repo: Coffee-slinging Waitress
programme.desc: First, Sonia and Froy storm a studio to repossess a Corvette from a surly European photographer and his hapless, bikini-clad subjects. Then, Lou and Matt stumble into a lover's quarrel - will they be able to reclaim the vehicle from two suited suitors?

programme.title: Operation Repo: Doomsday Prep
programme.desc: Matt and Froy struggle with language barriers when an Italian photographer and his assistant resort to violence because they can't comprehend. Will Sonia finally reveal what's happening, or will carrying her brother's burden get the best of her?

programme.title: Operation Repo: Couple of Yups/Bottled Feelings/A Screw Loose
programme.desc: First, Frankie and Lyndah find themselves in a fancy neighborhood, dealing with a pair of uptight yuppies with well-coordinated clothes and well-coordinated attacks. Then Lyndah goes wild when a truck-driving debtor gets physical with Sonia.

programme.title: Are We There Yet?: The Satchel Paige Episode
programme.desc: Nick hopes to hire a golden-voiced man for voice-over work; Suzanne misplaces Gigi's expensive cashmere sweater.

programme.title: Are We There Yet?: The Cyrano Episode
programme.desc: Nick helps out a coworker by ghostwriting him love letters for a woman on a dating website who turns out to be Gigi.

programme.title: Are We There Yet?: The Identity Theft Episode
programme.desc: Nick's identity is usurped by another man named Nick Kingston-Persons.

programme.title: Are We There Yet?: The Inappropriate Website Episode
programme.desc: When Nick lands on a porn website due to a spelling error, a co-worker takes it the wrong way, forcing KAWT employees to undergo sensitivity training.

programme.title: Are We There Yet?: The Open Mic Gaffe Episode
programme.desc: When Nick inadvertently insults Harold Bradley (a KAWT employee who has been around forever) on-air, he is forced to do damage control.

programme.title: Tyler Perry's Assisted Living: Testing 1, 2, 3
programme.desc: The Pleasant Days crew has their work cut out for them when they help Phillip prep for the S.A.T. (S3, ep5)

programme.title: Tyler Perry's Assisted Living: Efe The Great
programme.desc: When Efe becomes an accidental hero the Assisted Living crew uses his fame for their own gain. (S3, ep6)

programme.title: Tyler Perry's Assisted Living: I Will Dye For You
programme.desc: After Jeremy gets a gray hair, he sets out to prove he's not getting old. Mr. Brown has to speak at a funeral. (S3, ep7)

programme.title: Tyler Perry's Assisted Living: Ear Hustle And Flow
programme.desc: When Vinny gets his hearing aid fixed, he overhears a conversation that gets him into trouble. (S3, ep8)

programme.title: Tyler Perry's Assisted Living: Wobble Wobble
programme.desc: The Pleasant Days crew confronts Vinny over his reckless lifestyle. (S3, ep9)

programme.title: Tyler Perry's Assisted Living: Clean Up Your Act
programme.desc: Cora is fed up with the way the residents have been behaving and presents them with a new set of house rules. (S3, ep10)

programme.title: Paranormal State: Dwelling of the Dead
programme.desc: A single mom claims she is being physically assaulted by a spirit in her Kentucky home. Ryan first explores a natural explanation for the alleged phenomena. But the client's five-year-old son also sees spirits, and his sightings appear to line up.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Ghost On the Tracks
programme.desc: PRS is called to a New Jersey beauty salon, but they soon learn that the building's proximity to deadly train tracks might be the true cause of spirit activity.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Get Out of This House
programme.desc: When an aggressive spirit stalks a young family, PRS is called in to investigate. When it is determined that the source of the haunting may have been unknowingly invited in, Ryan races to identify and hopefully defeat the entity before it's too late.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Dark Practice
programme.desc: Brenda is terrified by a dark hooded figure spotted in her West Virginia home. The same entity allegedly tormented her late husband. PRS and Psychic/Medium Michelle Belanger help Brenda before she slips into the same abyss as her late husband.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Dead Legends
programme.desc: PRS and Psychic/Medium Chip Coffey investigate the famed Hotel Conneaut in northern Pennsylvania. Heavy doors opening on their own, sightings of a boy, a bride and a menacing butcher have the hotel's staff on edge.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Devil's Hostage
programme.desc: When a woman has long scratch marks mysteriously appear on her back, PRS is called in to see if they are truly facing the devil. But her credibility is called into question, a struggle of another kind emerges for Ryan and the rest of the team.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Dark Man
programme.desc: A grieving mother suspects her deceased son may have fallen victim to a mysterious entity called The Dark Man.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Paranormal Detour
programme.desc: With time off between cases, Ryan suggests to the PRS team they choose a random town to investigate. They roll into St. Helens, Oregon, home of Twilight, where they learn about the long history of the paranormal in the area.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Southern Discomfort At Sweetwater Mansion

programme.title: Paranormal State: The Fire
programme.desc: Christina has been experiencing paranormal activity ever since her father and step-mother were murdered near Columbus, OH last year. PRS and psychic/medium?Chip Coffey delve into a open murder case and wind up exposing a family divide.

programme.title: Paranormal State: The Cemetery
programme.desc: PRS visits a gothic graveyard, where a jealous spirit seems to be preying on the newlywed wife of the cemetery's caretaker. Ryan traces the haunting to a mysterious, unclaimed cremation urn on the grounds.

programme.title: Most Haunted: HMP Shrewsbury Part 1
programme.desc: Yvette Fielding and her team take on their biggest challenge yet in a prison where many have lost their lives and some seem to have remained.

programme.title: Most Haunted: HMP Shrewsbury Part 2
programme.desc: Part two of this mammoth investigation takes the team to the condemned cell and execution room. Is it a hangman or one of the executed souls that makes itself present and causes the team to re-evaluate what they are doing.

programme.title: Most Haunted: HMP Shrewsbury Part 3
programme.desc: The concluding part of the teams biggest investigation sees Yvette get the biggest shock of.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Halsham House

programme.title: Most Haunted: Lyceum Theatre

programme.title: World's Greatest: Forest Animals
programme.desc: Forest Animals gets up close with bears, koalas, moose, wolves, weaver ants, and Tasmanian Devils. This episode roves dark forests floors and soars above vast canopies of green in America, China, Laos, and Australia.

programme.title: World's Greatest: Cruises
programme.desc: There is something seductive about setting sail. Cruises offer us a chance to dip our toes into the 70% of our planet awash with oceans, rivers, and lakes, exploring places that can only be reached by daring to leave the shore.

programme.title: World's Greatest: Mountains
programme.desc: The earth’s fragile crust has folded and faulted, and nowhere are these natural forces more evident than in the world’s great mountains. Explore the highest peaks of the world’s terrain - the rugged realm between heaven and earth.

programme.title: World's Greatest: Marine Animals
programme.desc: From the surprises of colorful reef characters to effervescent penguins, killer sharks, and regal whales, dive into the places where nature reveals itself in some of its most marvelous and bizarre forms.

programme.title: World's Greatest: Archipelagos
programme.desc: The romantic notion of island life has always attracted us. Explore the histories, cultures, and unique ways of life on the World’s Greatest Archipelagos - clusters of islands that share common bonds of geography, geology, and genealogy.

programme.title: Arthur: The Butler Did...What?/The Trouble with Trophies
programme.desc: Bailey is missing! Muffy discovers a series of clues and is left wondering, who exactly IS Bailey? Then, everyone loves getting trophies, right? It turns out that Fern could not care less about them.

programme.title: Arthur: Buster's Book Battle/On the Buster Scale
programme.desc: Lakewood Elementary has just instituted IRP; a program where kids can earn points (and prizes!) for reading. Then, Buster and Brain never agree on movies. Buster rates every film a 10+, while Brain doesn't seem to like anything.

programme.title: Arthur: Muffy's Art Attack/Tales from the Crib
programme.desc: When Muffy sees a kinetic sculptor’s machines, she brags that she can make even better ones. Then, Vicita is upset at having to trade in her cherished crib for a big-girl bed, so D.W. shares her story of that same rite of passage.

programme.title: Arthur: Follow the Bouncing Ball/Buster Baxter and the Letter from the Sea
programme.desc: Alberto Molina's beloved soccer ball--signed by his favorite Ecuadorian soccer star --is lost! While on vacation, Buster discovers a message in a bottle on the shore. Could it be a message from the people of the lost city of Atlantis?

programme.title: Arthur: The Boy Who Cried Comet/Arthur and Los Vecinos
programme.desc: Buster is convinced that he's seen real UFO's, and he uses Muffy's fancy new telescope to get the proof. Then, Mr. Sipple from next door is moving away and Arthur wonders--who will be the new neighbors?

programme.title: Arthur: Fernlets by Fern/Prunella and the Haunted Locker
programme.desc: Muffy talks Fern into writing poems for a new line of greeting cards which becomes the hit of Elwood City, but booming business causes Fern to burn out. Prunella is assigned a new school locker, which is rumored to be haunted!

programme.title: Arthur: Rhyme For Your Life/For Whom The Bell Tolls
programme.desc: While struggling to write a poem for his mom, Binky falls asleep and gets trapped in Verseberg--where it's a crime not to rhyme! And D.W. has lost her voice! For Arthur it's a dream come true--until Mom asks Arthur to take care of D.W.

programme.title: Arthur: The Hallway Minotaur/Ladonna's Like List
programme.desc: Attention Lakewood Elementary! There's a new sheriff—er--hallway monitor-in town, and his name is George Lundgren. Ladonna Compson is friendly, funny, and full of personality. Everyone likes her! At least, that's what she thought.

programme.title: Arthur: Arthur Unravels/All the Rage
programme.desc: Grandma Thora teaches Arthur to knit and he's really into this new hobby. But…he's a kid! And a boy! Knitting is a grandma thing, right? And, Muffy wants to rock the fashion world, but creating a fad is a lot harder than it looks.

programme.title: Secret War: The Dutch Disaster
programme.desc: Operation North Pole was a WWII German deception using captured SOE agents to mislead Britain. 47 of 50 agents were captured. Despite warnings, SOE ignored signs of compromise to maintain support, leading to a major intelligence failure.

programme.title: Secret War: The Scholar and the Fight for Greece
programme.desc: Monty Woodhouse, a professor and a legend for blowing up the Gorgopotamos Bridge in Greece in 1942. In the British counter attack against Rommell at Al Alamein in North Africa it was vital to disrupt German supply routes, Greece.

programme.title: Secret War: The Banker, the Norwegians & the Bomb
programme.desc: Sir Charles attended Eton, and then joined the Coldstream Guards. He won the Military Cross on the Western Front and, having survived the war, returned to banking.

programme.title: Secret War: Double Agent Tricycle
programme.desc: Dusan Popov was almost certainly James Bond. Ian Fleming knew all the stories about him. Popov managed to persuade both the Germans and MI6 to keep him in the style of a millionaire businessman while performing a series of missions against the Nazis.

programme.title: Secret War: The Mafia Connection
programme.desc: Lucky Luciano, a mafia boss of the 1930s, was in jail in 1942 on charges of running prostitution rings. US intelligence services did a deal with him and he got the Italians to share intelligence on German U boat movements.

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show: Ashley & Mike
programme.desc: For over seven years, Ashley has sent dramatically altered photos of herself to her soul mate, Mike, to make her look thinner and more attractive to him.

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show: Anthony & Marq
programme.desc: Anthony is a war veteran who wears his heart on his sleeve. Over a year ago, he bonded online with a caring man named Marq. Today, they're head over heels in love - but what is Marq hiding?

programme.title: Catfish UK: Levi & Will
programme.desc: Levi is convinced Will is his dream man and broke up with his boyfriend so they could be together. After always cancelling on Levi, Oobah and Nella suspect something fishy is going on. (S2, ep2)

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show: Joe & Kari Ann
programme.desc: Joe was sceptical when Miss Teen USA, Kari, sent him a friend request. Now, after months of communication, Joe thinks it might be the real deal, and he might have found love with her. (S1, ep7)

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show
programme.desc: Since Leuh saw surfer Justin it's been insta-love. But after two failed attempts to meet up, she wants to know if he's the man of her dreams or is she one in a long line of online lovers. (S5, ep3)

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show
programme.desc: While Prophet, of Grammy-nominated Nappy Roots, is making his rap career comeback, he connected online with Trinity. Prophet's ready to settle down, but is this beauty too good to be true?

programme.title: The City: Roommate Wanted
programme.desc: Roxy &amp; Whitney continue to fight &amp; Roxy looks for her own place. Olivia reluctantly interviews a celebrity wearing Whitney's line &amp; Erin sees another opportunity to replace her. (S2, ep11)

programme.title: The City: Lost In Translation
programme.desc: Whitney faces a challenge when a PR company offers to represent her line, threatening her relationship with Kelly. Erin makes a final play in her effort to get Olivia replaced. (S2, ep12)

programme.title: The City: If She Can Make It Here...
programme.desc: Whitney arrives in New York City during fashion week just in time to start her new career with iconic designer, Diane Von Furstenberg. (S1, ep1)

programme.title: The City: The Truth Will Reveal Itself
programme.desc: Whitney's world is turned upside-down when a boy from her past shows up to warn her that Jay has been fooling around. Olivia decides that befriending Whitney is her new project. (S1, ep2)

programme.title: The City: The L Word
programme.desc: Whitney gets mixed signals from Jay and decides to ask him directly where she stands. Erin's new boyfriend comes to visit and Whitney realizes it's time to find her own apartment. (S1, ep3)

programme.title: Jersey Shore: All in the Family
programme.desc: When news gets out that Angelina and Vinny hooked up, Mike threatens to spill the beans to Jose. Vinny and Pauly find the girls of their dreams, but one of them will be heartbroken. (S2, ep8)

programme.title: Jersey Shore: Dirty Pad
programme.desc: Things go south for Angelina when the house learns that she slept with Jose after smushing Vinnie, but trouble really ensues when she gets too close to a guy Snooki hooked up with. (S2, ep9)

programme.title: Jersey Shore: Gone, Baby, Gone
programme.desc: Mike reunites with his Canadian hottie, providing entertainment for the whole house. But when Angelina tells her roommates how she really feels, she pushes Snooki into a frenzy. (S2, ep10)

programme.title: 48 Hours: Murder in Las Vegas
programme.desc: Ron Rudin, a wealthy real-estate developer disappeared from his home in Las Vegas, Nev. Later, the charred remains of his decapitated body were found in the desert. After a lengthy investigation police were convinced that Rudin’s wife was involved.

programme.title: 48 Hours: Fateful Connection
programme.desc: A report on the investigation led by a determined detective to solve a 30-year-old cold case involving two young women who went missing in Florida, in 1982.

programme.title: 48 Hours: The Dog Trainer, The Heiress, and the Bodyguard - Part 1
programme.desc: When a celebrity dog trainer is murdered, an heiress fears for her life and a bodyguard vows to be a hero.

programme.title: 48 Hours: The Dog Trainer, The Heiress, and the Bodyguard - Part 2
programme.desc: When a celebrity dog trainer is murdered, an heiress fears for her life and a bodyguard vows to be a hero.

programme.title: 48 Hours: Bitter Pill
programme.desc: Stella Nickell of Auburn, Washington, was sentenced to 90 year in federal prison for poisoning her husband Bruce and Sue Snow, a Seattle bank manager with cyanide-laced Excedrin.

programme.title: Garfield & Friends: Pros and Cons/Rooster Revenge/Lights! Camera! Garfield!
programme.desc: Garfield sets out to con a con./After an especially cruel trick Orson decides to get even with Roy./Garfield is spotted by famed film director Fredericko Fettucini.

programme.title: Garfield & Friends: Rip Van Kitty/Grabbity/The Big Catnap

programme.title: Garfield & Friends: Cabin Fever/U.S. Acres: Return of Power Pig/Fair Exchange
programme.desc: Garfield and Odie are snowbound in a cabin with no food./A monster circulates around the farm, Orson dons his "Power Pig" togs./Garfield dreams he changes places with Jon.

programme.title: Garfield & Friends: Garfield and Friends
programme.desc: While playing hide and seek, Odie gets found by a rich girl who wants a puppy.

programme.title: Garfield & Friends: The Legend of Cactus Jupiter/U.S Acres: Birthday Boy Roy/Jukebox Jon
programme.desc: Garfield dreams of being pioneers in outer space./Roy gets a watch for his birthday./Jon's attempt to break a habit by listening to a record in his sleep.

programme.title: Garfield & Friends: Attention-Getting Garfield/Swine Trek/Dog Food
programme.desc: Floyd, the mouse, shows Garfield how to get noticed./Orson dreams he is captain of a starship./Garfield tells Odie how they make dog food.

programme.title: Garfield & Friends: The Mail Animal/Peanut-Brained Rooster/Mummy Dearest
programme.desc: Garfield gets their mailman fired./Roy can't get enough of the latest crop of peanuts./Garfield dreams he's in ancient Egypt.

programme.title: Garfield & Friends: Garfield and Friends
programme.desc: Mr. Swindler returns and gets Jon to sell the house for $1. Wade’s forgetful cousin arrives.

programme.title: Garfield & Friends: Garfield and Friends
programme.desc: Garfield and Odie trick Jon into not taking a trip on his vacation.

programme.title: Garfield & Friends: Garfield and Friends
programme.desc: Garfield is adopted by an elderly lady. Roy buys a robot that creates weather.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible: The Killer
programme.desc: Robert Conrad guest stars as a professional assassin whom the Impossible Missions Force must prevent from Carrying out his assignment without knowing the identity of his target in "The Killer" segment of Paramount Television's "Mission: Impossible."

programme.title: Mission: Impossible: Flip Side
programme.desc: Sal Mineo guest stars as a ruthless young operator who heads up an international narcotics ring which the IMF attempts to break up on Paramount Television's "Mission: Impossible."

programme.title: Mission: Impossible: My Friend, My Enemy
programme.desc: Special-guest star Jill Haworth portrays a glamorous double agent, who uses her feminine wiles on Paris to set him up for an enemy plot on Paramount Television's "Mission: Impossible" series.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible: The Innocent
programme.desc: Christopher Connelly guest stars as a non-cooperative young computer genius who has "dropped out" of society, but is desperately needed by the IMF to complete their assignment on Paramount Television's "Mission: Impossible."

programme.title: Mission: Impossible: Decoy
programme.desc: Phelps falls in love with a woman that the IMF has been assigned to bring out of an iron curtain country over the seemingly insurmountable obstacles set in their way by the country's secret police in the "Decoy"

programme.title: Barney and Friends: Play It Safe!
programme.desc: It's always fun to share a day with Barney—but it's also important to learn how to "play it safe!" Baby Bop, wanting to be a good helper, has been attaching adhesive strips to her frustrated (and uninjured) brother, BJ.

programme.title: Barney and Friends: Barney and Friends
programme.desc: When some of the children in the park invite Barney to join them for a race./When BJ starts to feel sick after eating too many sweets, he lies down in hopes of feeling better.

programme.title: Barney and Friends: Barney and Friends
programme.desc: Baby Bop can't find anybody to play with her. When the others see her feeling sad, they decide to play whatever she wants to play. The dinos and kids are planning a camp-out at the park.

programme.title: Barney and Friends: Magic Caboose - Arts
programme.desc: Melanie is sad because she misses her friend who is visiting relatives in India. Barney shows his friends that it's fun to go to new places and see new things by taking them on an imaginary journey on the Magic Caboose!

programme.title: Barney and Friends: Barney and Friends
programme.desc: BJ’s efforts to decorate the park go awry when he accidentally paints the caboose several different colors. Baby Bop can’t wait for BJ and Riff to go on their camping trip.

programme.title: Barney and Friends: Coming on Strong
programme.desc: Exercise is good for everybody and every body! From running to touching toes to jumping jacks to some favorite songs and games, Barney and his friends grow strong while having fun with exercise.

programme.title: Barney and Friends: Gift Of The Dinos - Winter
programme.desc: It's Christmas and BJ dreams of getting a new baseball glove to go with his baseball, while Riff hopes for new drumsticks to use his drum. Barney reminds them that Christmas is more than just getting gifts and helps them learn the meaning of Christmas.

programme.title: Barney and Friends: Day and Night
programme.desc: With a little Barney magic, the children experience the differences between day and night!

programme.title: Barney and Friends: Bop Til You Drop - Sharing

programme.title: Teletubbies

programme.desc: Laa-Laa has fun watering the flowers when a watering can appears. The Teletubbies watch some children making flowers. The Teletubbies make up a dance. The animals are on the march through Teletubbyland.

programme.title: Teletubbies
programme.desc: Dipsy goes for a walk and sees lots of things in Teletubbyland. The Teletubbies watch as Andy Brown shows some children a rockpool. There's time for one more dance before Tubby Bye Bye.

programme.title: Bob the Builder

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: An observation tower is going to be added next to the Visitor’s centre to provide a scenic view of Sunflower Valley. The scaffolding is raised and Roley prepares a path to connect the tower to the Dome.

programme.title: Skyscrapers and Car Parks
programme.desc: Join Bob on his next visit On Site! Follow Bob and the team as they take us through the construction of skyscrapers & car parks. Learn how skyscrapers are built up high on strong foundations and see how lifts are needed to carry people to the top.

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Pam Goody is running out of money to complete the Arts Centre renovations and Molly suggests holding a fashion show to raise funds. Pam thinks this a wonderful idea and asks Molly to organise it. Bob is, of course, just the man to build a catwalk.

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: When Scrambler tells Spud that Bob is putting together the machinery for Farmer Pickles’ sunflower oil factory, he decides that putting things together is something he’d be very good at. So he heads off to the factory to lend a hand.

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Bob is building a lean-to for Mr Beasley’s allotment. Wendy offers to pick up the materials from JJ’s yard, while Bob makes a start on the cement floor. But before he can leave, Bob gets a call from Mr Dixon, who needs a hole in his roof fixed urgently.

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Scoop is keen to enter the town’s snowman competition, but a burst pipe outside Mr Sabatini’s needs fixing. Scoop is anxious when he sees the snowman that Mr Sabatini has made for the competition.

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: The team are building Sunflower Valley’s first geodesic dome. As Wendy has organised the dome and knows how it all fits together, Bob suggests that she might like to take charge of the job. Reluctantly Wendy agrees.

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Bob and the gang are building a pedestrian crossing. Mrs Percival, meanwhile, has asked Molly to paint a mural of a jungle scene in the school playground.

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Bob and the team are installing a bull-rush water recycling system to clean water from Farmer Pickles’ cottage. The clean water will be used to water Farmer Pickles new orchard. Bob explains that everything needs to be built in order – it’s a process.

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: The Team are converting Mr Sabatini’s windmill into a café. Roley is rolling the ground flat for all the tables and chairs while Bob makes the awnings. Roley hits trouble when molehills keep appearing where he’s just been rolling.

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Mr Sabatini has decided to move from Bobsville to set up the Sunflower Valley bakery. Bob and the team are going to build him a new house close to the river. Muck asks if Spud can tag along as he’s been telling him exciting stories.

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Bob and the gang leave to convert a house into two separate flats. Mr Bentley, meanwhile, has been left in charge of The Mayor’s dog.

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Bob is building a marshland walkway with his Dad’s help. Benny hears that the marsh is ‘like a jungle’ and becomes determined to finds some jungle animals like tigers. Every time he spots one, however, it turns out to be something very ordinary.

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Bob is repairing a leaking water tank at the school, when he discovers bats in the belfry. He tapes up the tank temporarily, but says the bats will need a new home as they are a protected species.

programme.title: Bob the Builder
